exp_contact_role.node: The role(s) performed by each person. Typically these terms should come from the Experimental Factor Ontology(https://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/EFO_0002012). If more than one role is needed per person, the roles should be given as a semicolon (;) delimited list.
The source of the Person Roles terms; this must reference one of the Term Source Names defined in the IDF file.
The accession number for this term, taken from the indicated Term Source.
